item.description:
Thank you, Betsy, for giving this one another try. Since so many members seemed to be away on vacation in August when this event was originally scheduled, we decided to give it another try in September in hopes of a better turn out.
Betsy will be the organizer for this event so please address any questions to her. And please only RSVP if you are actually going to make it.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Lemongrass!
